content_markdown:
#  Frequently Asked Questions About Penalty Payment 

Modified on: Tue, 11 Mar, 2025 at 10:47 AM

The following are the most frequently asked questions about Penalty Payment

#   

  

## 1\. How do I pay a penalty that has been issued by DGIE? 

**Ans:** Click [here](<https://support.irembo.gov.rw/en/support/solutions/articles/47001198816-how-to-pay-penalties>) to learn more about how to pay penalties. 

  

## 2\. Do I need an IremboGov account to pay a penalty?

**Ans:** You can apply for this service with or without an Irembo account.

  

## 3\. What are the requirements needed to pay a penalty?

**Ans:** Applicants should have a national ID or passport, a valid phone number, and an email address. Click [here](<https://www.migration.gov.rw/our-services/permit>) for more information. 

  

## 4\. Do I need any attachments while applying for this service on IremboGov?

**Ans:** No, there are no attachments needed for this application. 

  

## 5\. What is next after paying the penalty?

**Ans:** The applicant downloads the proof of payment and presents it to the DGIE officer for further processing.

  

## 6\. What is the processing time of the penalty payment?

**Ans:** The processing time is 7 days.
